pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 11, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 11, 2017:

Gatineau, Quebec

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Premier of Quebec, Philippe Couillard, will tour the Gatineau region affected by flooding via helicopter. A media availability will follow.

Corner of St-Louis Street and Moreau Street
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
  • Pooled coverage for helicopter tour
  • Open coverage for media availability (scheduled for 9:00 a.m.)

Toronto, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a demonstration at the Wealthsimple offices and deliver remarks.

860 Richmond Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for demonstration
  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m. and enter via the 862 Richmond Street West entrance

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Tech Town Hall at the OneEleven offices.

325 Front Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
